title: Anxiety Management and Academic Achievement Improvement Strategies Through Activity-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Time constraints for working learners and the need for self-directed learning in digital environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three anxiety-inducing factors in activity-based learning environments
Learners can write self-assessment reports using scales (e.g., 5-point Likert) that measure anxiety levels
Learners can apply at least two anxiety-management strategies (e.g., gradual exposure techniques) during group collaboration and individual tasks
Learners can establish action plans to improve academic achievement by at least 20% in blended learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
